channel.title: Teams on Polydigital Projects
channel.description: Recent content in Teams on Polydigital Projects

item.title: Wiki Editing
item.description: This document describes how to edit the project wiki (this site), it is intended for those who contribute to Polydigital projects and want to post public information about their work. Summary We publish this site to Github Pages, essentially we are using github to host our static site. We generate the site using Hugo that builds Markdown into our static site. We use Github to maintain versions of both our markdown source and for the public generated site.
